channel.title: Ad section
channel.description:
I originally just PMed MITB, but I've had a change of heart on these things so would like some input from everyone.
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,533385.0.html
Most topics here may be about ingame only, but I'd like to start some forum discussion. I've added 2 basic rules myself, what else do you feel should be added/removed/changed? If any?

item.title: Ad section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think those rules are fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Ad section
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

What do you think people will be advertising here?

Read full topic

item.title: Ad section
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There’s not many more that can be added really without stating some of the global forum rules. Are we allowing them to advertise their forum links on their thread? If not, you should mention that.

Read full topic
